title: Nami's Gifts
description: Nami has a problem: She must make the perfect gift for each person in her family. It is her family tradition. She cannot think of the perfect gift for Aunt Hoshi. What will she make for her aunt? Nami's Gifts provides the opportunity to introduce the story elements of problem and solution to emergent readers. Pictures support the text.
reviewWords: clues, collects, gift, holidays, special, tradition
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify problem and solution
awareness: Final Blends                : Discriminate final consonant blend /st/
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify final consonant blend st
grammar: Past-Tense Verbs                : Identify and use past-tense verbs
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word them
